features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Clerk-based authentication with user management and protected routes

features.name: Applicant Management
features.description: Complete CRUD system for managing loan applicants with company details, contact info, and risk assessment

features.name: Dashboard System
features.description: Comprehensive dashboard with stats, navigation, and data visualization for loan processing workflow

features.name: Workflow Engine
features.description: Multi-stage workflow system for processing loan applications with Inngest integration

features.name: Document Management
features.description: Upload, verification, and processing system for FICA documents and bank statements

features.name: Risk Assessment System
features.description: AI-powered risk analysis using Google Vertex AI for credit scoring and compliance checks

features.name: Quote Generation System
features.description: Automated quote generation with fee calculation and approval workflow

features.name: Form System
features.description: Multi-step form wizard for facility applications, agreements, and ABSA forms with magic link distribution

features.name: Agent Management
features.description: External agent fleet monitoring with callback handling and status tracking

features.name: Notification System
features.description: Real-time notifications with email integration using Resend and workflow event tracking

features.name: Digital Signature System
features.description: Canvas-based digital signature capture with integrity verification

features.name: Database Schema
features.description: Comprehensive SQLite schema with Drizzle ORM for applicants, workflows, documents, and risk assessments

features.name: API Integration Services
features.description: Third-party integrations for credit checks (ITC, Experian), ProcureCheck API, and V24/V27 sync

features.name: UI Components Library
features.description: Reusable UI components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS including tables, forms, dialogs, and status indicators

features.name: Landing Page
features.description: Marketing landing page with hero section, features showcase, and trusted partners display

features.name: Form Validation System
features.description: Zod-based validation schemas for all forms including facility applications, FICA documents, and quotes
